title: Spinneys unveils 2030 sustainability strategy, targets net zero operations by 2040 - ZAWYA
summary: Spinneys, a premium fresh food retailer in the UAE, has launched its sustainability strategy 'Better Together 2030' aiming for Net Zero operational emissions by 2040 and aligning with UN Sustainable Development Goals. The strategy comprises five pillars, focusing on product quality, sustainable sourcing, waste reduction, stakeholder engagement, and governance for sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE. Spinneys' sustainability strategy 'Better Together 2030' is an example of green innovation as it aims to reduce negative environmental externalities, such as emission reductions, sustainable sourcing, waste reduction, and environmental stewardship.
business_innovation: TRUE. Spinneys' sustainability strategy 'Better Together 2030' can be considered a business innovation as it represents a new approach to the firm's operations, introducing significant changes and improvements to align with sustainability goals.
green_product: TRUE. Spinneys' focus on crafting products that foster healthier lifestyles with sustainable sourcing and organic produce aligns with the definition of green products, which aim to reduce environmental impact throughout a product's lifecycle.
green_process: TRUE. Spinneys' commitment to reaching Net Zero operational emissions by 2040 through climate action, energy and emissions management, circular economy practices, and sustainable practices in stores reflects a green process that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 445110 - Supermarkets and Other Grocery (except Convenience) Stores, 445120 - Convenience Stores, 445210 - Meat Markets, 445220 - Fish and Seafood Markets
greenwashing: FALSE. The article describes Spinneys' genuine efforts and commitments towards sustainability, with clear goals and strategies, indicating it is not an example of greenwashing.
